text: Jhonny González Vera (born September 15, 1981) is a Mexican professional boxer.. Retrieved 26 September 2016. He is a three-time former world champion in two weight classes, having held the World Boxing Organization bantamweight title from 2005 to 2007, and the World Boxing Council featherweight title twice between 2011 and 2015. He also held the International Boxing Organization featherweight title from 2010 to 2011. == Personal life == González married professional wrestler Dulce García, better known as Sexy Star, in June 2015. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican boxers Category:World champions
title: Jhonny González
